import React,{useRef,useState} from 'react' import '../styles/tour-details.css' import { Container,Row,Col,Form,ListGroup } from 'reactstrap' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import tourData from '../assets/data/tours' import calculateAvgRating from '../utils/avgRating' import avatar from '../assets/images/avatar.jpg' import Bookings from '../components/Bookings/Bookings' import Newsletter from '../shared/Newsletter'; const TourDetails = () => { const {id}=useParams() // fetching data from database con const reviewMsgRef=useRef('') const [tourRating,setTourRating]=useState(null) const {photo,title,desc,price,address,reviews,city,distance,maxGroupSize}=tour const {totalRating,avgRating}=calculateAvgRating(reviews) const options={day:'numeric',month:"long",year:'numeric'} const submitHandler = e=>{ e.preventDefault() const reviewText=reviewMsgRef.current.value; alert(`${reviewText},${tourRating}`); } return ( <>

{title}

{avgRating===0?null:avgRating} {totalRating===0?('Unrated'):(({reviews?.length}))} {address}
{city} ${price}/per head {distance}k/m {maxGroupSize} people
Description

{desc}

{/* review section */}

Reviews ({reviews?.length} reviews)

setTourRating(1)}>1 setTourRating(2)}>2 setTourRating(3)}>3 setTourRating(4)}>4 setTourRating(5)}>5
{ reviews?.map(review=>(
Mahesh Babu

{new Date("07-20-2024").toLocaleDateString('en-US',options )}

5
Amazing tour
)) }
{/* review section-end */}
) } export default TourDetails
